description: Sedan class E with rear wheel drive. The world premiere of the second generation of the model took place at the Geneva Motor Show in March 2015
overview: The facelifted version of the XF sedan does not look like a complete overhaul of the previous model, but almost every noticeable exterior detail has received changes. The grille has increased, its design has changed; the front bumper was completely redrawn - now with high imitations of the air intake zones on the sides; Now narrower headlights got hold of the DRL pattern in the form of two letters J in each. At the rear, the changes also affected the optics - now it is darkened; the rear bumper received a different pattern, a diffuser appeared on it. Matrix head optics, 18â€“20-inch wheels and a panoramic roof are available to order. Each of the interior details was also revised, more high-tech solutions appeared. The steering wheel has become less massive due to the reduced hub; instead of the gearbox washer, a low but massive selector appeared on the central tunnel. As before, instead of the classic dashboard, you can get a digital-panel with modernized graphics. And the previous, recessed display has been replaced by a protruding 11.4-inch.

specifications.name: Engine capacity(l):
specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
